HDG.LOG.content: [Nietzsche-like] forgetting to meditate on essential origin of reason, let itself into its advent (Ankunft) [arrival] > more originally (ursprünglicher), legein as “bringing together,” legere as lesen, collecting & bringing together (Zusammenbringen)
HDG.LOG.linkedContent: [Nietzsche-like] forgetting to meditate on essential origin of reason, let itself into its advent (Ankunft) [arrival] > more originally (ursprünglicher), legein as “bringing together,” legere as lesen, collecting & bringing together (Zusammenbringen)

HDG.LOG.content: path for mortal thinking [?], in more primordial origin of logos [?] > logos needs omologein if present beings are to shine in presencing > omologein dispatches itself w/out presumption into the measuring (schickt sich unvermessen in das Ermessen) of logos [that Being needs human logos?]
HDG.LOG.linkedContent: path for mortal thinking [?], in more primordial origin of logos [?] > logos needs omologein if present beings are to shine in presencing > omologein dispatches itself w/out presumption into the measuring (schickt sich unvermessen in das Ermessen) of logos [that Being needs human logos?]

HDG.IM.content: “we lie in the pincers” > people must transpose itself from center of future happening into originary realm of powers of Being [but you haven’t answered Nietzsche yet!!!] > to ask how does it stand w/ Being? to repeat and retrieve (wieder-holen) inception of our historical-spiritual Dasein (inception begun again more originally) [repetition of origin]
HDG.IM.linkedContent: “we lie in the pincers” > people must transpose itself from center of future happening into originary realm of powers of Being [but you haven’t answered Nietzsche yet!!!] > to ask how does it stand w/ Being? to repeat and retrieve (wieder-holen) inception of our historical-spiritual Dasein (inception begun again more originally) [repetition of origin]

HDG.IM.content: German idealism didn’t collapse, age wasn’t great enough to stand up to greatness, breadth, originality of spiritual world, to realize it (more than apply propositions/insights) > Dasein began to lack depth (from which essential comes/returns to human beings), a leveling, no more rank (a blind mirror that no longer mirrors) [w/out rank, can’t stand up to greatness of spirit, but what about the greatness of killing that spirit? (e.g. Nietzsche)]
HDG.IM.linkedContent: German idealism didn’t collapse, age wasn’t great enough to stand up to greatness, breadth, originality of spiritual world, to realize it (more than apply propositions/insights) > Dasein began to lack depth (from which essential comes/returns to human beings), a leveling, no more rank (a blind mirror that no longer mirrors) [w/out rank, can’t stand up to greatness of spirit, but what about the greatness of killing that spirit? (e.g. Nietzsche)]

HDG.BC.content: in thinking, we move in ontological difference > [***] perhaps too much, inappropriate to speak of the differentiation btwn Being/beings in 1st place, difference already objectified w/out being able to specify where it belongs [why is belonging what makes it inappropriate?] > talk of the differentiation: differentiation is origin of all differences [differance, but it would erase origin]
HDG.BC.linkedContent: in thinking, we move in ontological difference > [***] perhaps too much, inappropriate to speak of the differentiation btwn Being/beings in 1st place, difference already objectified w/out being able to specify where it belongs [why is belonging what makes it inappropriate?] > talk of the differentiation: differentiation is origin of all differences [differance, but it would erase origin]

HDG.BC.content: does most said in saying keep its essence secret? [why name Being?], Being keeps its essence silent, as silence, origin of language > the animal doesn’t speak: silence is impossible for it > language stands in essential relation to uniqueness of Being [Being needs man]
HDG.BC.linkedContent: does most said in saying keep its essence secret? [why name Being?], Being keeps its essence silent, as silence, origin of language > the animal doesn’t speak: silence is impossible for it > language stands in essential relation to uniqueness of Being [Being needs man]

HDG.BC.content: [slow down] no way out in any direction: Being cast itself toward us—in saying something about Being, we cast it away > perceive the impasse into which Being places us as a sign pointing toward where we already are placed, since we comport ourselves toward beings [presuppositions? also, what is a sign if you already know its parent?] [rather than impasse as aporia: impasse is what it is] > concealed abode, to which essence of our history owes its origin, abode that concerns our essence
HDG.BC.linkedContent: [slow down] no way out in any direction: Being cast itself toward us—in saying something about Being, we cast it away > perceive the impasse into which Being places us as a sign pointing toward where we already are placed, since we comport ourselves toward beings [presuppositions? also, what is a sign if you already know its parent?] [rather than impasse as aporia: impasse is what it is] > concealed abode, to which essence of our history owes its origin, abode that concerns our essence

HDG.FS.content: origin of dichotomy [subject/object]: mutation of truth into certainty, priority given to man as ego cogito, rise to position (Stellung) of subject > nature becomes object (ob-jectum), nothing other than “what is thrown over against me (das mir Entgegengeworfene)”
HDG.FS.linkedContent: origin of dichotomy [subject/object]: mutation of truth into certainty, priority given to man as ego cogito, rise to position (Stellung) of subject > nature becomes object (ob-jectum), nothing other than “what is thrown over against me (das mir Entgegengeworfene)”

HDG.FS.content: nothing characterizes being: ontological proposition > when nothing & its negating aren’t understood negatively, being is something entirely other (etwas ganz und gar Anders) than a being > participle “nihilating (nichtend)” as determinate activity of being, durch die allein das Seiende ist > name it an origin if all ontic-causal overtones are excluded [possible?]: Ereignis of Being as condition for arrival (Ankunft) of beings: das Sein lasst das Seinde anwesen [factical life]
HDG.FS.linkedContent: nothing characterizes being: ontological proposition > when nothing & its negating aren’t understood negatively, being is something entirely other (etwas ganz und gar Anders) than a being > participle “nihilating (nichtend)” as determinate activity of being, durch die allein das Seiende ist > name it an origin if all ontic-causal overtones are excluded [possible?]: Ereignis of Being as condition for arrival (Ankunft) of beings: das Sein lasst das Seinde anwesen [factical life]

HDG.CCP.content: thinking as commemoration (Andenken), akin to what is noble (Edlen) > night entices you to exult > exulting in waiting, become more waitful & more void > emptier, but richer in contingencies [risk, chance] > noble is what has origins [cf. Nietzsche’s On the Genea…] > noble abides in origins of its nature [habituate to your heart?]
HDG.CCP.linkedContent: thinking as commemoration (Andenken), akin to what is noble (Edlen) > night entices you to exult > exulting in waiting, become more waitful & more void > emptier, but richer in contingencies [risk, chance] > noble is what has origins [cf. Nietzsche’s On the Genea…] > noble abides in origins of its nature [habituate to your heart?]

HDG.CCP.content: abiding in his origin, man drawn to what is noble (in his nature): presentiment (Vermuten) of the noble mind > patience extends the furthest, waits the longest [arrival?] > [summary] “a patient noble-mindedness would be pure resting in itself of that willing, which, renouncing willing, has released itself to what is not will” > that which thanks for being allowed to thank [thanks nothing]
HDG.CCP.linkedContent: abiding in his origin, man drawn to what is noble (in his nature): presentiment (Vermuten) of the noble mind > patience extends the furthest, waits the longest [arrival?] > [summary] “a patient noble-mindedness would be pure resting in itself of that willing, which, renouncing willing, has released itself to what is not will” > that which thanks for being allowed to thank [thanks nothing]

HDG.DL.content: no answer will help us, must see (erblicken) appearance as reality (Wesen) of presence (Anwesen) in its essential origin (Wesensherkunft) [no refutation of Greek thought]
HDG.DL.linkedContent: no answer will help us, must see (erblicken) appearance as reality (Wesen) of presence (Anwesen) in its essential origin (Wesensherkunft) [no refutation of Greek thought]

HDG.LP.content: “softly (leise)” always leads us softly to essential relations (wesenhaften Bezüge) > pain conceals itself in stone (petrifying pain) > silent glow of 1st dawn (earliest, ancient origin [uralte Herkunft]), the prior beginning coming toward everything that is becoming (Werdende), brings it to the never-to-be-obtained arrival [the never-arriving arrival] (nie einholbare Ankunft) of its essential being
HDG.LP.linkedContent: “softly (leise)” always leads us softly to essential relations (wesenhaften Bezüge) > pain conceals itself in stone (petrifying pain) > silent glow of 1st dawn (earliest, ancient origin [uralte Herkunft]), the prior beginning coming toward everything that is becoming (Werdende), brings it to the never-to-be-obtained arrival [the never-arriving arrival] (nie einholbare Ankunft) of its essential being

HDG.WL.content: what is speaking (Sprechen), the expression of thought, if we think of its origin as the inner activity of spirit (inneren Geistestätigkeit)? > acc. modern thought, labor of spirit (Arbeit des Geistes) is a setting/positing (Setzen) (thesis), spirit conceived as subject, represented w/in subject-object model (Schema), so positing must be synthesis btwn subject/object
HDG.WL.linkedContent: what is speaking (Sprechen), the expression of thought, if we think of its origin as the inner activity of spirit (inneren Geistestätigkeit)? > acc. modern thought, labor of spirit (Arbeit des Geistes) is a setting/positing (Setzen) (thesis), spirit conceived as subject, represented w/in subject-object model (Schema), so positing must be synthesis btwn subject/object

HDG.WL.content: phonetic-acoustic-physiological explanation of sounds (Lautung) of language doesn’t experience their origin in ringing stillness (Geläut der Stille)
HDG.WL.linkedContent: phonetic-acoustic-physiological explanation of sounds (Lautung) of language doesn’t experience their origin in ringing stillness (Geläut der Stille)

HDG.WL.content: thinking must stop thinking we are thinking of “Being” as appropriation, Ereignis is richer than any conceivable definition of Being > Being, however, can be thought of, re: its origin, in terms of Ereignis [beyond Being]
HDG.WL.linkedContent: thinking must stop thinking we are thinking of “Being” as appropriation, Ereignis is richer than any conceivable definition of Being > Being, however, can be thought of, re: its origin, in terms of Ereignis [beyond Being]
